resources.string: Your Blessing Notification will display at 8 a.m. daily.
All it takes to wish someone good luck is to send a thoughtful message.
Bleassings are very crucial. They help keeps us going in life.
Blessings are directly associated with, and are believed to come from, God.
To express a blessing is like bestowing a wish on someone that they experience the favor of God, and to acknowledge God as the source of all blessing.
